response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an even greater asset in your hands. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially be worth $1,500,000 to you, at a significantly discounted rate. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
